H0.text: where did the battle of waterloo occur. Brussels

H1.text: where did the battle of waterloo occur. Ligny

H2.text: where did the battle of waterloo occur. Quatre Bras

H3.text: where did the battle of waterloo occur. Waterloo

A4.text: The battlefield is located in the Belgian municipalities of Braine-l'Alleud and Lasne, about 15 kilometres (9.3 mi) south of Brussels.

A5.text: The battlefield is located in the Belgian municipalities of Braine-l'Alleud and Lasne, about 2 kilometres (1.2 mi) from Waterloo.
